testcase.name: test_flow
testcase.description: 1. Install AiO app / clear data of AiO app.~!~2. Launch AiO app.~!~3. Go to Home screen.

testcase.name: test_aioVersion
testcase.description: 1. Tap on the top right drop down menu.~!~2. Tap on the item About.
testcase.expectedResult: 1. AiO application version text and version number is display correctly.(Check the number on log or screenshot)~!~2. AiO application name is displayed correctly.~!~3. AiO application icon is displayed correctly.

testcase.name: test_copyRight
testcase.expectedResult: 1. AiO application copy right text is display correctly~!~2. AiO application copy right start year is displayed correctly~!~3. AiO application copy right end year is displayed correctly

testcase.name: test_legalInformaion
testcase.description: Fllow the last step.~!~1. Tap on the Legal Information link.~!~2. Tap on the OK button.
testcase.expectedResult: 1. Legal information popup is opened.~!~2. Popup tile is Legal information.~!~3. Popup content matches the latest wireframe (Only verify this exists.)

testcase.name: test_endUserLicenseAgreement
testcase.description: Fllow the last step.~!~1. Tap on the License agreement link.
testcase.expectedResult: 1. License agreement web page is opened.~!~2. HP logo is displayed.~!~3. HP license content is correct.(Ignore this step, since there is no correct result now.)

testcase.name: test_endUserLicenseAgreement_back
testcase.description: Follow the last step. Tap on the Back key.

testcase.name: test_hpOnlinePrivacyStatement
testcase.description: Follow the last step. Tap on the HP Online Privacy link.
testcase.expectedResult: 1. HP Online Privacy web page is opened.~!~2. HP logo is displayed.~!~3. HP Privacy statement is displayed correctly.

testcase.name: test_hpOnlinePrivacyStatement_back
testcase.description: Follow the last step. Tap on the OK button.

testcase.name: test_shareThisApp
testcase.description: Follow the last step. Tap on the Share this app button.
testcase.expectedResult: 1. Share with popup is opened.~!~2. Email is displayed under Android 6, QQ is displayed under Android 5.~!~3. Back to About screen displayed after tapping the Back key.

testcase.name: test_shareThisApp_back
testcase.expectedResult: Back to About screen displayed after tapping the Back key.

testcase.name: test_headerDisplay
testcase.description: Follow the last step.~!~Tap on the Back icon.
testcase.expectedResult: Screen goes back to AiO Home.
